report.title: 2nd-Excom(2019) Meeting of PES/IAS/PELS Joint Chapter/ IEEE-Hyderabad Section Jointly with Industrial Relations Committee (IRC)

description.text: <p>This is the 2nd Executive Committee (2019) Meeting / Administrative Meeting of PES/IAS/PES Jt. Chapter/ IEEE-Hyderabad Section. This is being organised Jointly with the Industrial Relations Committee (IRC) / Hyderabad Section.&nbsp;This meeting will be attended by Our Jt.Chapter Excom Members and a few special invitees. For this ExCoM Meeting, we invited the Chair, IRC, Sri V.Venkata Ramana. We will interact with Sri V.Venkata Ramana to enable us to reach out to various Industries in the Geographic Area of our Hyderabad Section. We will take the help of Sri Venkata Ramsa to organise few Industry Visits/ Field Visits to Industries for our IEEE members. Also, we will plan to do jointly few programs and also get few sponsors for our various Events/ Programs.&nbsp;</p> <p>The Plan of Chapter activities for the Year-2019 will be discussed in detail. A brief Report on the activities completed till June in the Program Year-2019 will be presented. The work Plan for the activities from June to Dec-2019 will be discussed.&nbsp;</p>

report.title: PDP: Workshop on “Solar Power Plants & Battery Energy Storage Systems in Utility Grids & Microgrids", by PES/IAS/PELS Jt Chapter, Hyderabad, Jointly with Guntur Sub-Section and in Association with KLEF Deemed to be University, Near Guntur, AP State
report.keywords: Solar PV Power Plants, Power Electronic Converters, PCU, Microgrids, Battery Energy Storage Systems, Energy Storage Systems, power systems, Indian Grids, Li-Ion Batteries, Bi-directional Power Electronic Converters.
report.cosponsor_name: Koneru Lakshmaiah Educational Foundation (KLEF)/ KL Deemed to be University/ Green Fields, Vaddeswaram, (Near Guntur City) Guntur District, Andhra Pradesh (AP), India/ PIN: 522 502/ Website: https://www.kluniversity.in/

speaker.organization: Retired from BHEL/ Corporate R&D/ Hyderabad

topic.title: “Solar PV Power Plants and their Power Electronic Converters” & “Battery Energy Storage Systems---Future Opportunities"

speaker.organization: M/s Efftronics Systems Pvt. Ltd, Vijayawada, AP, India

topic.title: Lecture and Practical Demonstration of “Industrial Energy Management Systems”,

report.title: IEEE-PES/IAS/PELS-Jt.Chapter/Hyderabad Administrative Meeting-3/ held Jointly with Excom of IEEE-Hyderabad--Guntur-Sub-Section, Guntur, at M/s Efftronics, Vijayawada

description.text: <p>This was an IEEE-PES/IAS/PELS-Jt.Chapter/Hyderabad Admin Meet-3 in 2019/ held Jointly with Excom of IEEE-Hyderabad--Guntur-Sub-Section, Guntur, venue was at M/s Efftronics Systems Pvt Ltd, Vijayawada. This was an interaction and planning meet. In this meet we discussed the Plans of Our Jt. Chapter to conduct 2 or 3 programs in the next few months of this Year-2019 at the IEEE--Guntur-Sub-Section, in their geographics area, around Guntur. We learnt the ideas/ Plans of the Excom of this Guntur-Sub-Section. Few Programs/Activities by PES/IAS/PELS--Jt.Chapter for the Year-2019, at IEEE--Guntur--Sub-Section, were Short listed. The same will be integrated into our Jt. Chapter Plans. Also, the Issues related to Implementation/ Funding/ Resources Availability were discussed. An Action Plan was developed for implementation.</p>

report.keywords: Admin Meet/ Excom of Chapter/ Plan of Programs for Year-2019.
